title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1270 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1270 - General

State Regulations
§ 1270.1 - Definitions
§ 1270.2 - Permission to use terminal conditional
§ 1270.3 - Unauthorized commercial activity prohibited
§ 1270.4 - Unauthorized parking and storage of aircraft prohibited
§ 1270.5 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited
§ 1270.6 - Use of public aircraft facilities conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIV, subch. D, art. 2, pt. 1270

Statutory authority: N.Y. Laws 1921, ch. 154, art. VI and
N.J. Laws 1921, ch. 151, consented to by Congress 42 U.S. Stat. 174 [1921]; N.Y. Laws 1922, ch. 43 and N.J. Laws 1922, ch. 9, consented to by Congress 42
U.S. Stat. 822 [1922]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
